content: As an AI language model, I do not have information about the latest updates on the Buccaneers' plans. However, as per the latest reports, the Buccaneers have been continually monitoring the situation and working closely with local health officials and the NFL to determine the safest way to host games with fans. It is expected that the capacity for fans allowed in the stadium can be increased as more people get vaccinated, and the situation continues to improve, depending on the recommendations from the health authorities. Nonetheless, the team has been very careful in ensuring the safety of everyone, and if there are any adjustments to the current protocols or capacity, the team will communicate them to the fans and the public.
